post_install:
$VirtualBoxHome = (Join-Path (Get-DataPath) "/VirtualBox")
	  mkdir -Force $VirtualBoxHome > $null
	  [Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable("VBOX_USER_HOME", $VirtualBoxHome, "User")
	  $env:VBOX_USER_HOME = $VirtualBoxHome
	  pushd $dir
	  Start-Process -FilePath VirtualBox-4.3.8-92456-Win.exe -ArgumentList --silent, --extract, --path, $dir -wait
	  Start-Process -FilePath msiexec -ArgumentList /i, VirtualBox-4.3.8-r92456-MultiArch_amd64.msi, /quiet, /qn, INSTALLDIR=$dir, /l*v, $dir/install.log, /norestart -wait
	  popd
	  Start-Process -FilePath "$dir/vboxmanage" -ArgumentList "setproperty", "machinefolder", "$VirtualBoxHome/machines"
